dmca.title: PITY THE ANIMALS
dmca.body:
This is [Private], Manager/Owner of [Private].
You need to IMMEDIATELY CEASE and DESIST using our name, website address,
or any form of information or likeness pertaining to us in the emails you
are sending out.  Or the next contact from us will come via our lawyer.
You should also check your facts prior to accusing businesses of
"cruelty". We are USDA / APHIS LICENSED.
Be aware that what your are doing is slander, and charges can and if
necessary will be brought against you.

[Private]
[Private]
